Class MyDBUtils

java.lang.Object
persistence.MyDBUtils
public class MyDBUtils extends Object
Constructor for MyDBUtils. Initializes database configurations from a properties file.

  • Method Details

    • get_connection

      public static Connection get_connection(MyDBUtils.db_type type, String server, String port, String db, String user, String pwd) throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the database.
      Parameters:
      type - Database type.
      server - Database server address.
      port - Database server port.
      db - Database name.
      user - Database user.
      pwd - Database password.
      Returns:
      A Connection object to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • exec_sql

      public static int exec_sql(Connection conn, String sqlCmd) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL command that does not return a result set.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object.
      sqlCmd - SQL command to execute.
      Returns:
      Number of records affected by the command, or -1 in case of an error.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • exec_query

      public static ResultSet exec_query(Connection conn, String sqlCmd) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL query command.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object.
      sqlCmd - SQL query command to execute.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet object containing the data produced by the query.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • get_select_command

      public static String get_select_command(String field)
      Crie os métodos públicos que devolvem a string contendo o comando SELECT corretamente construído a partir dos valores enviados a cada função. Apenas o parâmetro fields tem de ter conteúdo não nulo e não vazio: o get_select_command(field) o get_select_command(fields, tables, where_cond) o get_select_command(fields, tables, where_cond, order_by) o get_select_command(fields, tables, where_cond, group_by, having, order_by)

    • exist

      public static boolean exist(Connection conn, String table, String where) throws SQLException
      Checks if a record exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object.
      table - Table name to check.
      where - WHERE condition for checking existence.
      Returns:
      true if the record exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • lookup

      public static ResultSet lookup(Connection conn, String field, String table) throws SQLException
      Performs a lookup operation in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object.
      field - Field name to retrieve.
      table - Table name to lookup.
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing the result of the lookup.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • lookup

      public static Object lookup(Connection conn, String field, String table, String where_cond, String default_value) throws SQLException
      Performs a lookup operation in the database with a default value.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object.
      field - Field name to retrieve.
      table - Table name to lookup.
      where_cond - WHERE condition for the lookup.
      default_value - Default value to return if no record is found.
      Returns:
      The value of the field or the default value if no record is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
